Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Zap

  1. What battle cards are in the Blaster Deck?
    2 x Basic Combat Protocol
    3 x Escape Route
    2 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Vaporize
    2 x Zap
    3 x Daring Counterattack
    3 x Interpert the Airwaves
    3 x Obstructive Rhythm
    3 x Recover Cassette
    3 x Backup Beam
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    3 x Pep Talk
    2 x Incoming Transmission
  2. The rules state that when you play an action, you set it off to the side. When Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend plays an action as part of his attack ability, is that card set aside, thus removing the pip from counting attack damage? Example: Prime flips Zap and Supercharge during his attack. He chooses to play Zap. Is his final attack value 9 or 10?
    The Zap gets set aside, but the orange icon would still increase the attack.
